reviewText: Ordered on the recommendation of another Santa.  Didn't live up to it's recommendation.  Thought it would be more informative, not just stories.

This program is more lecture than documentary, and with the wrong person at the helm, it could've been no more than a pig in a poke.  Fortunately, this isn't the case.  Hollembaek, who has been presenting programs about Christmas to kids for almost two decades, is excellent at what he does, and he makes you forget the few drawbacks to this program, which would make an excellent addition to any church library.
